markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Lizardfolk Stargazer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=293)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The tradition of astrology and looking to the stars for both navigation and prognostication is well-established in iruxi society, and their wise and observant stargazers are among the people’s most respected members. Even the lowliest stargazer, as presented here, has a number of useful primal spells to aid their kin; in larger iruxi settlements, stargazers wield even greater powers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Lizardfolk Stargazer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=293)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 231</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Iruxi](/Languages.aspx?ID=32)

**Skills**
[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +4, [Iruxi Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +8 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +8,
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 20, attack +10
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179), [Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282), [Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=316)

**Deep Breath**   A lizardfolk stargazer can hold their breath for 200 rounds (20 minutes).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-71" />
name: Lizardfolk Stargazer
